job.title: AWS Data Engineer
job.description:
AWS Data Developer

Location: McLean; VA (Fortune 500 client)

2 Days ONSITE after Pandemic

12 Months Contract


AWS Data Developer

  • We are migrating the legacy based platform into cloud Solution (Hadoop to AWS migration). Refactoring the Compute into AWS where we have Kubernetes container based solutions.
  • 5+ years of experience in software development including design, coding, testing, and support
  • 3+ years of Cloud infrastructure experience working with one or more of the following Amazon Web Services (AWS) Cloud services: EC2, EMR, ECS, S3, SNS, SQS, Cloud Formation, Cloud watch, Lambda
  • Hands-on experiences with Python and PySpark
  1. Hadoop and AWS - must have hands-on experience with development, not administration. 
  2. Python is a must have with Spark/PySpark. 
  3. Kubernetes knowledge is nice to have
